content.new: After qdeling a segway job, and then recovering it, I found that segway attempted to recover from the last round run, rather than the one previous. This resulted in issues where it was looking for certain params files that did not yet exist. For instance

issue.title: Segway attempts to recover from last round run, rather than the one previous
